input_args.text:
'Next Prev Swipe left/right Lord Heseltine confesses to “strangling a dog”– the funniest Twitter reactions Lord Heseltine has broken the internet today with his confession that he once strangled a dog.
Here’s the clipping from The Times: 
So how has the internet reacted to this self-confessed dog strangler? 
(“Self-confessed dog strangler” being the phrase we now hope all journalists start using to refer to the self-confessed dog strangler.) 
Here’s the best 8: 
1 Source: twitter.com/MJowen174 
2 'well yes I think there's a very clear case for an immediate public inquiry into Mr Heseltine' pic.twitter.com/rsbsj1Spds 
— Katie Martin (@katie_martin_fx) November 1, 2016 
3 
— Alistair Coleman (@alistaircoleman) November 1, 2016 
4 
— barney farmer (@barneyfarmer) November 1, 2016 
5 
— Jim Waterson (@jimwaterson) November 1, 2016 
6 heseltine: "i'm doing an interview, what shall i talk about?"agent: "just don't say anything controversial" pic.twitter.com/VVELz6NqsT 
— k e e t (@KeetPotato) November 1, 2016 
7 Some may say it's not the first time Michael Heseltine has acted decisively to destroy a deranged, but once much loved, member of the family pic.twitter.com/6LBPAU8zmP 
— Sir Peter Mannion MP (@PeterMannionMP) November 1, 2016 
8 
— Holly Watt (@holly_watt) November 1, 2016 
But as Yakhunt cynically says: 
“This Orgreave business, we need something to deflect to save Thatcher’s legacy” 
Heseltine, “Well, there’s that time I strangled a dog.. ”'
